DOC.brief_summary: - Determine sensitivity , specificity accuracy vascular ultrasound , use direct indirect ultrasonographic sign , obstructive disease iliac venous segment , patient advance chronic venous insufficiency ( CEAP 3-6 ) , consider intravascular ultrasound ( IVUS ) gold standard diagnosis . - Develop algorithm noninvasive ultrasound investigation obstructive lesion iliac segment patient advance chronic venous insufficiency ( CEAP 3-6 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Vascular Ultrasound Versus Intravascular Ultrasound Diagnosing Iliac Vein Obstruction
DOC.criteria: Advanced Chronic Venous Insufficiency ( CEAP 36 ) submit clinical treatment least 1 year response . Subject must > 18 < 80 year age Willing participate able understand , read sign inform consent document plan procedure On duplex ultrasound : patent common femoral vein , patent deep femoral vein , and/or femoral vein study leg Subject provide write informed consent Previous venous stent implantation involve study leg inferior vena cava Previous venovenous bypass surgery involve study leg Known reaction sensitivity iodinate contrast manage premedication Subjects pregnant ( woman childbearing potential must negative pregnancy test within 7 day prior enrollment Acute deep venous thrombosis involve either leg Known history chronic total occlusion common femoral vein study leg . Known history thrombophilia ( e.g. , protein C S deficiency , antithrombin III deficiency , presence lupus anticoagulant , etc . ) Venous compression cause tumor encasement Venous outflow obstruction cause tumor thrombus Life expectancy le 6 month Lower Extremity Arterial Insufficiency Elevated baseline blood creatinine ( value great upper limit normal range ) Any concurrent disease condition , opinion Investigator , would make subject unsuitable participation study ; example include limited inability lie supine index procedure ( e.g. , severe congestive heart failure ) , thrombocytopenia hematological disorder associate unacceptable risk bleeding , implant orthopedic hardware precludes proper imaging , etc .
